nodes.text: Ruby Bliel was a red colored mixed beverage that was popular among pirates. Many varieties of the drink were served in bars at pirate planetary bases. In 22 BBY, Ruby Bliel was served at the bar in the Outlander Club on the planet Coruscant.

Ruby Bliel first appeared in  Star Wars canon in the 2002 movie Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. It was first identified in the new in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: How Not to Get Eaten by Ewoks and Other Galactic Survival Skills by Christian Blauvelt. The drink was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 1999 novelization of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
